name.description: Unique identifying name for this custom ability

description.description: A human-readable description of this custom ability

introduced_by_issue.description: URL to GitLab issue that added this custom ability

introduced_by_mr.description: URL to GitLab merge request that added this custom ability

feature_category.description: The feature category of this this custom ability. For example, vulnerability_management

milestone.description: Milestone that introduced this custom ability. For example, 15.8

group_ability.description: Indicate whether this ability is checked on group level.

project_ability.description: Indicate whether this ability is checked on project level.

requirement.description: The custom ability that needs to be enabled for this ability

skip_seat_consumption.description: Indicate wheter this ability should be skiped when counting licensed users
